welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aridagawa, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint city known for its stunning natural landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Aridagawa has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 3 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shirahama Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Shirahama Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
